last_episode_to_air.name: The Wolves of War
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gerard initiates his final attack on the Supernaturals of Beacon Hills

name: Teen Wolf
overview: Scott McCall, a high school student living in the town of Beacon Hills has his life drastically changed when he's bitten by a werewolf, becoming one himself. He must henceforth learn to balance his problematic new identity with his day-to-day teenage life. The following characters are instrumental to his struggle: Stiles, his best friend; Allison, his love interest who comes from a family of werewolf hunters; and Derek, a mysterious werewolf with a dark past. Throughout the series, he strives to keep his loved ones safe while maintaining normal relationships with them.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Scott McCall is bitten by The Alpha and turns into a werewolf. He then must learn how to balance being a werewolf with his normal life, including his love interest, Allison. Finding out who the Alpha is and killing him was a huge point in the plot of Season 1.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: After an action-packed end to its premiere season, Teen Wolf jumps full force into season two with even more suspenseful drama. Scott McCall, an ordinary teenager with a wild secret, continues to find himself caught in a supernatural war between hunters and werewolves. While navigating the complicated roadways of high school, Scott must keep his forbidden romance with Alison a secret and protect himself from new Alpha wolf Derek. Scott will have to trust his instincts above all else if he hopes to end war in Beacon Hills and keep his friends and family safe.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Four months after the events that nearly ended Jackson's life and resurrected Peter Hale's, teen wolf Scott McCall and his friends begin their junior year of high school unaware that the new threat has arrived in Beacon Hills: a pack of Alpha werewolves intent on bringing Derek into their fold, while destroying his young pack.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Still healing from tragic losses, Scott, Stiles, Lydia, and Kira return to a new semester of school with more human worries than supernatural, while also trying to help their new friend, Malia, integrate back into society. But Kate Argentâ€™s surprising resurrection brings a new threat to Beacon Hills along with the emergence of another mysterious enemy known simply as The Benefactor.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: On the eve of Senior Year, Scott and his friends find themselves facing the possibility of a future without each other, a next phase of their lives that might take them in different directions despite their best intentions. Little do they know that outside forces are already plotting to break the pack apart long before they ever see graduation; new villains that use a combination of science and the supernatural for a malevolent and mysterious purpose that will eventually pit Scott and his friends against their greatest enemy yet.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: The final season features the greatest threat yet: The Ghost Riders of The Wild Hunt. These beings erase people from existence--including eradicating them from the memories of those who knew them--and a member of Scott's pack is among the first to be taken. Scott and his remaining pack must find a way to defeat the Ghost Riders AND remember and rescue their lost and forgotten friend before everyone in Beacon Hills is erased.

episodes.name: Wolf Moon
episodes.overview: When Scott suffers a werewolf bite, his strange new abilities begin to complicate his life - and his relationship with the new girl in town.

episodes.name: Second Chance at First Line
episodes.overview: Scott struggles to balance his new life as a werewolf and the pressures of being a teen, all while avoiding werewolf hunters and trying to score a second date with Allison.

episodes.name: Pack Mentality
episodes.overview: Scott and Allison end up in a group date; an animal attack has Stiles' sheriff father on the lookout.

episodes.name: Magic Bullet
episodes.overview: A new hunter comes to town and shoots Derek, who is certain to die unless Scott can find the right kind of bullet that caused his injury.

episodes.name: The Tell
episodes.overview: There's another animal attack involving Lydia and Jackson, raising more questions about wild animals. Meanwhile, Scott and Allison skip school and Derek must deal with the werewolf hunters on his own.

episodes.name: Heart Monitor
episodes.overview: Scott tries to control his transformation so he can spend more time with Allison. Elsewhere, Derek continues trying to make an ally of Scott.

episodes.name: Night School
episodes.overview: Scott and the others are trapped inside the high school as the Alpha draws near.

episodes.name: Lunatic
episodes.overview: The hunt is on for Derek's whereabouts, meanwhile Stiles tries to help Scott with controlling his transformation when a second full moon is approaching.

episodes.name: Wolf's Bane
episodes.overview: Jackson seeks out a specialist regarding the wound on his neck.

episodes.name: Co-Captain
episodes.overview: Scott moves to protect his friends from the Alpha, meanwhile Stiles makes a discovery about Derek's family.

episodes.name: Formality
episodes.overview: While Derek is still stuck in captivity, Scott's true identity might become public information.

episodes.name: Code Breaker
episodes.overview: Caught in a war between hunters and werewolves, Scott seeks help from friends and enemies.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Scott McCall is bitten by The Alpha and turns into a werewolf. He then must learn how to balance being a werewolf with his normal life, including his love interest, Allison. Finding out who the Alpha is and killing him was a huge point in the plot of Season 1.

episodes.name: Omega
episodes.overview: When Lydia goes missing from the hospital, werewolves and hunters begin a search.

episodes.name: Shape Shifted
episodes.overview: Isaac's father is murdered; Scott, Stiles and Derek plan a break-out. At the same time, the Argent family remove the principal and Allison's grandfather replaces him. Scott senses that another werewolf is in the lacrosse locker room and plans to sniff them out, literally.

episodes.name: Ice Pick
episodes.overview: Scott tries to keep Derek from creating new werewolves; Argent officially begins Allison's training; the new creature in town takes another victim.

episodes.name: Abomination
episodes.overview: When the new shapeshifter strikes again, Scott has to recruit a reluctant Allison to acquire a rare book in Gerard's collection, while also once again surviving dinner with her family.

episodes.name: Venomous
episodes.overview: Derek becomes convinced that Lydia is the shapeshifter they're after, forcing Scott to gather his friends -- and even some enemies -- to protect her.

episodes.name: Frenemy
episodes.overview: With startling new information about the shapeshifter, Scott and Stiles hurry to protect their friends while Allison is given an investigative task by her family.

episodes.name: Restraint
episodes.overview: As Lydia begins to make connections about the bite from Peter, Jackson causes new problems for Scott and Stiles while Derek has a crisis of faith in his leadership as a new Alpha.

episodes.name: Raving
episodes.overview: During a secret concert, Scott and Stiles come up with a method to trap the new shapeshifter. At the same time, Allison's mother comes up with a plan of her own to take care of Scott once and for all.

episodes.name: Party Guessed
episodes.overview: Even as his relationship with Allison becomes further strained, Scott and Stiles must attend Lydia's birthday party while Derek locks his new wolves up to watch after them on their first full moon together.

episodes.name: Fury
episodes.overview: Scott, Stiles, Melissa and Stillinski are taken hostage; Allison tracks Derek to the station.

episodes.name: Battlefield
episodes.overview: Scott plays in the championship lacrosse game and must figure out a way to stop Gerard. Meanwhile, Allison continues her hunt for Derek and his pack.

episodes.name: Master Plan
episodes.overview: Scott races to uncover Gerard's master plan following a shocking death on the lacrosse field. Derek plots to take Gerard down using his own methods. Erica and Boyd are captured as Allison continues her merciless bloodthirsty revenge on the werewolves for her mother's suicide. Meanwhile, Scott, Stiles, Lydia, Melissa and Isaac are all under pressure amidst the chaotic events.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: After an action-packed end to its premiere season, Teen Wolf jumps full force into season two with even more suspenseful drama. Scott McCall, an ordinary teenager with a wild secret, continues to find himself caught in a supernatural war between hunters and werewolves. While navigating the complicated roadways of high school, Scott must keep his forbidden romance with Alison a secret and protect himself from new Alpha wolf Derek. Scott will have to trust his instincts above all else if he hopes to end war in Beacon Hills and keep his friends and family safe.

episodes.name: Tattoo
episodes.overview: The secret behind Derek's tattoo is revealed and the Alpha pack make their presence known. Derek and Isaac struggle to locate Erica and Boyd.

episodes.name: Chaos Rising
episodes.overview: Allison and Lydia locate a possible clue to finding Boyd and Erica while one of Stiles' childhood friends goes missing.

episodes.name: Fireflies
episodes.overview: With Boyd and Cora on the loose and under the influence of the full moon, Scott and Derek must turn to an unlikely ally for help.

episodes.name: Unleashed
episodes.overview: While Scott tries to keep Isaac from engaging in a deadly confrontation with the Twins in school, Stiles attempts to prove his theory that the killings have nothing to do with werewolves.

episodes.name: Frayed
episodes.overview: During a bus ride to a cross country meet, Scott and his friends flash back to the events of a preemptive strike against the Alphas that has left several injured and possibly one or more dead.

episodes.name: Motel California
episodes.overview: Stranded at a motel for the night because of the postponed cross country meet, Scott and the others suffer strange experiences that cause them to believe members of their own group may the mysterious killerâ€™s newest targets.

episodes.name: Currents
episodes.overview: As the danger begins to reach closer to Scott, threatening his trusted mentor and boss, Deaton, Kali and the Twins go after Derek.

episodes.name: Visionary
episodes.overview: Seeking answers, Scott, Allison and Stiles hear stories told by two unlikely narrators and discover a secret about the color of a werewolfâ€™s eyes.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Knew Too Much
episodes.overview: As Allison begins to suspect someone dangerously close to her may be involved in the murders, Scott and Stiles conclude that Lydiaâ€™s rising talents may be their best bet to solving the murders.

episodes.name: The Overlooked
episodes.overview: Trapped inside an evacuated Beacon Hills hospital by a powerful storm, Scott and Derek must defend themselves against the Alphas while trying to figure out how to save Coraâ€™s life.

episodes.name: Alpha Pact
episodes.overview: With the threat growing far more personal and time running out on innocent lives, Scott is forced to make a difficult choice in order to save both friends and family while, at the same time, Derek and Peter try to figure out how to save Coraâ€™s life.

episodes.name: Lunar Ellipse
episodes.overview: Under Deatonâ€™s advice, Scott and his friends use an ancient but extremely dangerous ritual to help them both save the lives of the people they love and stop Deucalion from achieving his sinister goal.

episodes.name: Anchors
episodes.overview: Scott, Stiles and Allison suffer side effects from the ritual sacrifice; Sheriff Stilinski searches through old cases.

episodes.name: More Bad Than Good
episodes.overview: Scott and his friends ponder catching the werecoyote before it is hunted down; an unlikely ally helps Derek and Peter break out.

episodes.name: Galvanize
episodes.overview: On the night before Halloween, Mischief Night, a convicted murderer brought to Beacon Hills Hospital for surgery escapes, forcing Scott and his friends to step in to help when his unexpected target becomes clear.

episodes.name: Illuminated
episodes.overview: Beacon Hills is under curfew from the power outage; the teens throw a blacklight Halloween party; Scott tries to earn Kira's trust.

episodes.name: Silverfinger
episodes.overview: Scott's friends pledge to protect him against an increasingly hostile enemy while Argent, Isaac and Allison search for answers through an old adversary from the Japanese Yakuza. At the same time, Stiles enlists Melissa's help in figuring out exactly what's going on with him.

episodes.name: Riddled
episodes.overview: Stiles goes missing; Scott and the others set off on a search; Lydia tries to master her new abilities.

episodes.name: Letharia Vulpina
episodes.overview: Scott and the others try to prevent a disaster; Lydia and Allison seek out an unlikely teacher.

episodes.name: Echo House
episodes.overview: Scott and the others seek an important artifact; Stiles must make a decision about Eichen House.

episodes.name: The Fox and the Wolf
episodes.overview: An important clue is revealed in the story of a World War II internment camp; Kira's role is more crucial, and she discovers unusual abilities.

episodes.name: De-Void
episodes.overview: Scott and Lydia join forces. Meanwhile, Stilinski faces a review board.

episodes.name: Insatiable
episodes.overview: Kira faces an unexpected enemy.

episodes.name: The Divine Move
episodes.overview: Scott and Derek call upon their friends and allies to make a last stand.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Four months after the events that nearly ended Jackson's life and resurrected Peter Hale's, teen wolf Scott McCall and his friends begin their junior year of high school unaware that the new threat has arrived in Beacon Hills: a pack of Alpha werewolves intent on bringing Derek into their fold, while destroying his young pack.

episodes.name: The Dark Moon
episodes.overview: When one of their friends goes missing, Scott and the pack travel into Mexico on a search and rescue mission.
Scott teams up with an unlikely source in the hopes of putting an end to Kate's evil plan.

episodes.name: Muted
episodes.overview: Whilst Stilinski investigates a murder, Scott has his place on the Lacrosse team threatened by a freshman.

episodes.name: The Benefactor
episodes.overview: When the full moon is out, Lydia's lake house brings uninvited guests, and Derek hunts for a killer.

episodes.name: I.E.D.
episodes.overview: Scott, Stiles and Kira participate in their first Lacrosse game; Lydia looks to get help controlling her powers.

episodes.name: Orphaned
episodes.overview: A dangerous enemy forces Scott to help him. Derek and Malia track down an old ally.

episodes.name: Weaponized
episodes.overview: A mysterious outbreak takes over the high school.

episodes.name: Time of Death
episodes.overview: Scott attempts a dangerous plan to draw out The Benefactor. Malia confronts her past.

episodes.name: Perishable
episodes.overview: An assassin targets Scott and Liam at the lacrosse team's annual bonfire.

episodes.name: Monstrous
episodes.overview: Scott and Kira fight to protect Satomi's pack from assassins.

episodes.name: A Promise to the Dead
episodes.overview: Scott and his Pack begin a dangerous battle against an old enemy.

episodes.name: Smoke and Mirrors
episodes.overview: Scott and Stiles return to La Iglesia to save the Pack from Kate.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Still healing from tragic losses, Scott, Stiles, Lydia, and Kira return to a new semester of school with more human worries than supernatural, while also trying to help their new friend, Malia, integrate back into society. But Kate Argentâ€™s surprising resurrection brings a new threat to Beacon Hills along with the emergence of another mysterious enemy known simply as The Benefactor.

episodes.name: Creatures of the Night
episodes.overview: On the eve of senior year, Scott and his pack deal with the arrival of a new enemy and the return of an old friend.

episodes.name: Parasomnia
episodes.overview: Stiles is suspicious of a new classmate; and Lydia helps a student with night terrors.

episodes.name: Dreamcatchers
episodes.overview: Scott tracks a new shapeshifter that's threatening Stilinski; and Malia receives information about her mother.

episodes.name: Condition Terminal
episodes.overview: Stiles works on tracking down a fugitive; Liam tries to be Mason's wingman at a nightclub.

episodes.name: A Novel Approach
episodes.overview: In hopes of learning more about the Dread Doctors, the pack goes into Eichen House.

episodes.name: Required Reading
episodes.overview: After following Dr. Valack's advice, Scott and the others begin to experience strange things.

episodes.name: Strange Frequencies
episodes.overview: Stiles is suspicious about a new girl showing up and what her intentions are. Scott's plans to protect the newest victim are derailed when The Dread Doctors attack.

episodes.name: Ouroboros
episodes.overview: Scott and Malia get help to try to find Hayden and Liam. Deaton discovers something horrific about the dread doctors. Hayden and Liam will be faced with a life and death situation.

episodes.name: Lies of Omission
episodes.overview: Scott finds himself turning to an unlikely ally for help. Stiles and Lydia attempt to find out the truth about Parrish.

episodes.name: Status Asthmaticus
episodes.overview: With both lives and friendships on the verge of being destroyed, Scott and his pack face their greatest enemy yet.

episodes.name: The Last Chimera
episodes.overview: Scott and Stiles try to learn what is behind the mysterious infection that is killing the town sheriff.

episodes.name: Damnatio Memoriae
episodes.overview: Even without the support of his pack, Scott considers what the Dread Doctors' success means for Beacon Hills.

episodes.name: Codominance
episodes.overview: Kira and her mother make a journey to help Kira deal with her dark side; Lydia is surprised at Eichen House.

episodes.name: The Sword and the Spirit
episodes.overview: As Scott tries to put his pack back together, Malia and her new ally set out to rescue Deaton from The Desert Wolf.

episodes.name: Amplification
episodes.overview: Upon learning that Lydia is in danger, Stiles makes a plan to break her out of Eichen House; Theo has his own plans.

episodes.name: Lie Ability
episodes.overview: While trapped in Eichen House with Theo and the Chimera pack, Scott tries to rescue Lydia before time runs out.

episodes.name: A Credible Threat
episodes.overview: Scott and his pack use a charity lacrosse game in a deadly gambit to figure out the identity of the Beast.

episodes.name: Maid of GÃ©vaudan
episodes.overview: Scott, Stiles, Lydia, Malia, and Liam are trying to figure out how to defeat the Beast of GÃ©vaudan that the Maid of GÃ©vaudan, Marie-Jeanne Valet, faced in 1765. As Gerard Argent, recounts Valetâ€™s story to Scottâ€™s pack in hopes they can deduce the creatureâ€™s weaknesses.

episodes.name: The Beast of Beacon Hills
episodes.overview: With the identity of the Beast finally revealed, Scott and his friends are in a race against time to stop The Dread doctors from implementing their final plan.

episodes.name: Apotheosis
episodes.overview: Loyalties are tested and new alliances forged as Scott and his friends work to stop the Beast before Beacon Hills is razed to the ground.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: On the eve of Senior Year, Scott and his friends find themselves facing the possibility of a future without each other, a next phase of their lives that might take them in different directions despite their best intentions. Little do they know that outside forces are already plotting to break the pack apart long before they ever see graduation; new villains that use a combination of science and the supernatural for a malevolent and mysterious purpose that will eventually pit Scott and his friends against their greatest enemy yet.

episodes.name: Memory Lost
episodes.overview: With graduation approaching, a supernatural force rides into Beacon Hills and crosses paths with Scott and his friends, while Liam discovers evidence of a new enemy in the high school.

episodes.name: Superposition
episodes.overview: While Scott, Lydia and Malia search for lost memories of a missing friend, Corey discovers a connection between his abilities and the Wild Hunt.

episodes.name: Sundowning
episodes.overview: Scott, Lydia and Malia search for Stiles; Liam and the others throw a party in order to keep a friend safe from the Ghost Riders.

episodes.name: Relics
episodes.overview: Scott and Liam protect the lacrosse team from an attack; Lydia searches for clues in Stiles' disappearance.

episodes.name: Radio Silence
episodes.overview: Trapped within the Wild Hunt, Stiles reunites with an unexpected ally; Scott, Lydia and Malia learn that Stiles' Jeep may be connected to his disappearance.

episodes.name: Ghosted
episodes.overview: Scott, Lydia and Malia search for clues about the Wild Hunt in a mysterious place called Cannan while Liam and and Hayden take drastic measures in the fight against the Ghost Riders.

episodes.name: Heartless
episodes.overview: Scott and Liam make an attempt to capture a Ghost Rider; Malia and Peter try to find a way into the Wild Hunt.

episodes.name: Blitzkrieg
episodes.overview: Scott, Lydia and Malia decide to storm the rift and rescue Stiles; Liam, Hayden and Mason make a deal with Theo to learn Douglas' plan.

episodes.name: Memory Found
episodes.overview: While Liam and Theo act as decoys, Scott, Lydia and Malia enact a desperate plan to try and remember Stiles.

episodes.name: Riders on the Storm
episodes.overview: The fate of Beacon Hills hangs in the balance as Scott and his pack face off against Douglas in a final showdown.

episodes.name: Said The Spider To The Fly
episodes.overview: As Scott readies Beacon Hills for his imminent departure, a mysterious presence breaks out of Eichen House.

episodes.name: Raw Talent
episodes.overview: Scott and Malia search for the owner of a unique bullet, fearing that a new breed of werewolf hunter has come to Beacon Hills. At the same time, Lydia must face her own fears of Eichen House.

episodes.name: After Images
episodes.overview: While Scott and the others desperately pursue a missing werewolf, Melissa and Argent investigate the nature of a strange body.

episodes.name: Face-to-Faceless
episodes.overview: Scott, Lydia and Malia have to take drastic measures to quell the growing violence in Beacon Hills, while Liam endures his own gauntlet at the high school.

episodes.name: Pressure Test
episodes.overview: When Scott and the others struggle to protect two new werewolves, an unlikely ally joins in the fight.

episodes.name: Triggers
episodes.overview: Liam and Theo attempt to draw the Hunters away from Beacon Hills.

episodes.name: Werewolves of London
episodes.overview: After a shocking attack leaves the pack reeling, Scott sets out to recruit reinforcements.

episodes.name: Genotype
episodes.overview: Scott and the others must make a discovery before itâ€™s too late.

episodes.name: Broken Glass
episodes.overview: Scott and Malia prepare for battle while Argent searches for an old ally.

episodes.name: The Wolves of War
episodes.overview: Gerard initiates his final attack on the Supernaturals of Beacon Hills

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: The final season features the greatest threat yet: The Ghost Riders of The Wild Hunt. These beings erase people from existence--including eradicating them from the memories of those who knew them--and a member of Scott's pack is among the first to be taken. Scott and his remaining pack must find a way to defeat the Ghost Riders AND remember and rescue their lost and forgotten friend before everyone in Beacon Hills is erased.
